Input group

Use the input group component to combine an input field and an input add-on. An example: the vl-datepicker component combines an input field and an input add-on into an input group.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-input-group

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-input-group

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-input-group/src/scss/input-group";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

Input group with icon add-on left

Displays an icon add-on on the left side of an input field.

      <label class="vl-form__label"
    for="city-1"
  >
    Gemeente
  </label>
  <div class="vl-input-group"><button class="vl-input-addon js-vl-tooltip"
          type="button"
          data-vl-tooltip-content="Locatie kiezen"
          data-vl-tooltip-accessibility="none">
    <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-location" aria-hidden="true"></i>
    <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Locatie kiezen</span>
  </button>
  <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--block"
    type="text"
    id="city-1"
    name="city-1"
    value=""/></div>

Input group with icon add-on right

Displays an icon add-on on the right side of an input field.

      <label class="vl-form__label"
    for="city-2"
  >
    Gemeente
  </label>
  <div class="vl-input-group">
  <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--block"
    type="text"
    id="city-2"
    name="city-2"
    value=""/><button class="vl-input-addon js-vl-tooltip"
          type="button"
          data-vl-tooltip-content="Locatie kiezen"
          data-vl-tooltip-accessibility="none">
    <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-location" aria-hidden="true"></i>
    <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Locatie kiezen</span>
  </button>
  </div>

Input group with text add-on left

Displays a text add-on on the left side of an input field.

      <label class="vl-form__label"
    for="city-3"
  >
    Gemeente
  </label>
  <div class="vl-input-group"><button class="vl-button">
    Locatie kiezen
  </button>
  <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--block"
    type="text"
    id="city-3"
    name="city-3"
    value=""/></div>

Input group with text add-on right

Displays a text add-on on the right side of an input field.

      <label class="vl-form__label"
    for="city-4"
  >
    Gemeente
  </label>
  <div class="vl-input-group">
  <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--block"
    type="text"
    id="city-4"
    name="city-4"
    value=""/><button class="vl-button">
    Locatie kiezen
  </button>
  </div>

Input group with button icon add-on left

Displays a button icon add-on on the left side of an input field.

      <label class="vl-form__label"
    for="city-5"
  >
    Gemeente
  </label>
  <div class="vl-input-group"><button class="vl-button vl-button--icon">
    <i class="vl-button__icon vl-vi vl-vi-location" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      <span class="vl-u-hidden">Locatie kiezen</span>
  </button>
  <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--block"
    type="text"
    id="city-5"
    name="city-5"
    value=""/></div>

Input group with button icon add-on right

Displays a button icon add-on on the right side of an input field.

      <label class="vl-form__label"
    for="city-6"
  >
    Gemeente
  </label>
  <div class="vl-input-group">
  <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--block"
    type="text"
    id="city-6"
    name="city-6"
    value=""/><button class="vl-button vl-button--icon">
    <i class="vl-button__icon vl-vi vl-vi-location" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      <span class="vl-u-hidden">Locatie kiezen</span>
  </button>
  </div>

Input group with narrow button icon add-on left

Displays a narrow button icon add-on on the left side of an input field.

      <label class="vl-form__label"
    for="city-7"
  >
    Datum
  </label>
  <div class="vl-input-group"><button class="vl-button vl-button--icon vl-button--narrow">
    <i class="vl-button__icon vl-vi vl-vi-calendar" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      <span class="vl-u-hidden">kies een datum</span>
  </button>
  <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--block"
    type="text"
    id="city-7"
    name="city-7"
    value=""/></div>

Input group with narrow button icon add-on right

Displays a narrow button icon add-on on the right side of an input field.

      <label class="vl-form__label"
    for="city-8"
  >
    Datum
  </label>
  <div class="vl-input-group">
  <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--block"
    type="text"
    id="city-8"
    name="city-8"
    value=""/><button class="vl-button vl-button--icon vl-button--narrow">
    <i class="vl-button__icon vl-vi vl-vi-calendar" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      <span class="vl-u-hidden">kies een datum</span>
  </button>
  </div>
